greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n mod 3 = 0 then n/3 else n.
comment: Multiplicative with a(3^e) = 3^(e-1), a(p^e) = p^e otherwise. - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 09 2005
Numerator of n/3. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 18 2014
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,2,0,0,-1).
formula: a(n) = A109044(n)/3. Dirichlet g.f. zeta(s-1)*(1-2/3^s). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 18 2011
a(n) = a(-n) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 05 2017
maple: A051176:=n->numer(n/3); seq(A051176(n), n=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 18 2014
mathematica: a[n_] := Numerator[n/3]; Array[a, 100, 0] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 18 2014 *)
program: a051176 n = if m == 0 then n' else n  where (n',m) = divMod n 3
(PARI) a(n) = if (n % 3, n, n/3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 02 2016
(Sage) [numerator(n/3) for n in range(70)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 19 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
